short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrolls past TikTok Ads for you. Make sure you're in fullscreen view so that the AdBlocker works by clicking the comments button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block TikTok Ads. Yeah, just enter fullscreen mode by clicking the comments button. That's it.
